snippet: Kevin Clash, the puppeteer behind Elmo on "Sesame Street," has taken a leave of absence after a claim that he had a sexual relationship with a 16-year-old boy. Mr. Clash has said the relationship started only after the person, now 23, was over the...
abstract: Kevin Clash, the puppeteer behind Elmo on "Sesame Street," has taken a leave of absence after a claim that he had a sexual relationship with a 16-year-old boy. Mr. Clash has said the relationship started only after the person, now 23, was over the age of 18.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH JENSEN and BRIAN STELTER

headline.main: Elmo Puppeteer Accused of Underage Relationship
headline.print_headline: Voice of Elmo on Leave After Accusation
